import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Eye, Brain, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react'; const ExpertiseSection = () => { const [showCV, setShowCV] = useState(false); const toggleCV = () => { setShowCV(!showCV); }; return (

My Expertise

Oculoplastic Surgeon

  • Board-certified with 9 years of experience
  • Specializing in oculoplastic, orbital & lacrimal surgery
  • Expert in ptosis, entropion, and facial nerve palsy reconstruction
  • Advanced treatments for eyelid and orbital tumors

AI Researcher

  • Pioneering AI applications in ophthalmology
  • Developing AI for Grave's orbitopathy diagnosis
  • Creating innovative blink tracking for blepharospasm
  • Leading research in anterior segment disease classification
{showCV && (

Additional Expertise and Achievements

Surgical Procedures

  • Orbital decompression surgery
  • Repair of blowout fractures
  • Dacryocystorhinostomy

AI Research Collaborations

  • The Anterior Segment AI AMED Research Group (JASAIR)
  • Olympia Eye Hospital for thyroid eye disease diagnosis

Technical Skills

  • Programming languages: Python, Swift
  • AI/ML frameworks: PyTorch
  • iOS app development
  • Data analysis and visualization tools

Notable Projects

  • Developed an AI-powered app for early detection of eye diseases
  • Created a machine learning model for classifying retinal abnormalities
  • Designed and implemented an iOS app for patient education and post-operative care

Selected Publications and Presentations

  • "Identification of Pediatric Glaucoma Using Deep Learning on Eye Position Photos" - 126th Annual Meeting of the Japanese Ophthalmological Society (April 2022, Osaka)
  • "Estimation of Proptosis Using Deep Learning on Periocular Photos" - 3rd Annual Meeting of the Japanese Society for Ophthalmic AI (November 2022, Kyoto)
  • "Validation Study of a Smartphone-based AI System for Thyroid Eye Disease Identification Integrated with Electronic Medical Records" - 127th Annual Meeting of the Japanese Ophthalmological Society (April 2023, Tokyo)

Professional Memberships

  • Asia Pacific Society of Ophthalmic Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery (APSOPRS)
  • Japanese Society of Ophthalmic Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery (JSOPRS)
  • Japanese Society of Lacrimal Passage and Tear Dynamics (JSCT)
  • Japanese Society of Artificial Intelligence of Ophthalmology (JSAIO)
  • Japanese Ophthalmological Society

For a full list of publications, please visit my Google Scholar Profile.

)}
); }; export default ExpertiseSection;
